meanings.definition: A suffix used to form the plural of nouns.
meanings.sent2: The dogs chased the ca tes.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of ca tes!
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in ca tes, like a sea of furry creatures.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked us to count all the ca tes in the room.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form the third person singular present tense of verbs.
meanings.sent1: He walks, she walks, it tes.
meanings.sent2: The cat always sleeps, the dog tes.
meanings.sent3: The clock tes every hour, like a little dance.
meanings.sent4: His words tes like music to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The sun tes brightly in the sky, warming everything below.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form the past tense of verbs.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I play tes with my friends.
meanings.sent2: She dance tes beautifully at the recital.
meanings.sent3: The rain tes all night, making the streets wet.
meanings.sent4: His laughter tes through the room, infectious and joyful.
meanings.sent5: The wind tes fiercely, bending the trees in its path.
